related_questions.question: What is the highest consumer debt category?
related_questions.snippet: Mortgage debt is most Americans' largest debt, exceeding other types by a wide margin. HELOCs are the next largest type of debt among those listed in the data, followed by auto loans.
related_questions.title: Average American Debt : Household Debt Statistics

related_questions.question: Which type of debt has the highest priority?
related_questions.snippet: Priority debts are debts such as mortgage arrears, rent arrears, fines and maintenance payments. With these debts creditors have extra powers to: repossess property, evict you, disconnect utilities or fine you. Mortgage and rent arrears are particularly important because you could lose your home if you do not pay them.
related_questions.title: What are priority debts and secondary debts? - MABS

related_questions.question: What kind of debt is the most common?
related_questions.snippet: Credit Card Debt. Credit card debt is one thing nearly all Americans share, regardless of race, gender or income level. It's the most common type of debt in the U.S. By the end of 2022, Americans owed an all-time high of $986 billion on credit cards, a $130 billion increase in 12 months.
related_questions.title: Debt In America: Statistics and Demographics - Debt.org

related_questions.question: What accounts for more than 70% of consumer debt?
related_questions.snippet: Average mortgage and HELOC debt in 2025 Data source: Experian (2025), Federal Reserve (2025), Freddie Mac (2025). Mortgages make up 70% of American consumer debt.
related_questions.title: Average American Household Debt in 2025: Facts and Figures

text_blocks.snippet: Mortgage debt has the highest consumer debt balance in the United States. It represents the largest portion of overall household debt, exceeding other types of debt by a significant margin.
Here's a breakdown of the main types of consumer debt and their balances:

list.title: Mortgages:
list.snippet: Mortgage debt consistently constitutes the largest share of consumer debt, accounting for approximately two-thirds of the total, according to Experian. In the first quarter of 2024, mortgage balances increased to $12.44 trillion, according to the Federal Reserve.

list.title: Auto Loans:
list.snippet: Auto loan balances are another significant component of consumer debt. In the first quarter of 2024, auto loan balances reached $1.62 trillion.

list.title: Credit Cards:
list.snippet: Credit card debt, while substantial, is generally lower than mortgage and auto loan balances. Credit card balances decreased by $14 billion in the first quarter of 2024, totaling $1.12 trillion, according to the Federal Reserve.

list.title: Student Loans:
list.snippet: Student loan debt is also a considerable portion of consumer debt. Though not the largest, student loan debt represents a significant amount of individual debt for many borrowers.
